msbt.message: I hope this birthday is a super- mega-awesome one for !
is so radiant today, it's like sparkling! Birthdays are the BEST!And, like, when is smiling, I get really happy too!
is so completely totally super big-time fab today! Birthdays are the BEST!
Hi! I'm ! It's so super to meet you!I'm here to celebrate 's birthday!It's totally fab to meet friend! talks so much about you!

Maybe this makes me sound silly, buthow awesome are birthday decorations?Completely, right? Awesome? Completely awesome? <10_4 />Yes. They are COMPLETELY awesome.Do you think it'd be weird if I, like, had birthday decorations up all year?
Isn't 's birthday party AWESOME?I hope my birthday party is at least half this fabulous!

This is so much fun! Ohmigosh! Wouldn't it be LE BONKERS if there were birthday parties every day?There'd be tons of cake, and presents, andHANG! ON!I just realized EVERY DAY is SOMEONE'S birthday. We ALREADY have birthday parties every day!
I heard has been looking forward to this party for, like, FOREVER!I totally get that. I cannot WAIT for my next b-day! My parties are always so fab.
I helped decorate yesterday to get ready for the party. It was big-time fun!It's only once a year, so you want to be sure it all looks glam, right? I'm SO glad everything turned out great!
Did you give your present already?All the sweetest presents are the ones you put a lot of thought into.But I think the best gifts are Bells.
Ugh! It took me SO LONG to figure out my birthday present!, you're better at this kind of stuff than me. Next time I'll just ask you!
I hope likes my present!They say it's the thought that counts. Well, this has some super awesome thoughts!
Hey, it's ! Did you know I'd moved to ? I live here now! So, like, hi, neighbor!B-T-Dubs, it's 's birthday today! Let's make it a wild one!

! What a coinkydink, seeing you here. How are you doing?I moved to this island and never thought I'd run into you here. So nice to see you!Are you here for 's b-day party too? Well then, let's make it a fun one, !
Heeey! Are you a friend of 's? I'm ! Are you here to celebrate 's b-day too?Well then! Let's go make this party a PAR-TAY, !
